Mobility.Description:
可動性は、地上から行う初期ジャンプの高度と、歩行速度・しゃがみ歩き速度を上昇させます。

ダッシュ速度は8 m/sで固定であり、可動性の影響は受けません。

また、可動性はハンターのクラススキルのクールダウン速度を向上させます。
Mobility.StrafeSpeed: 左右・後方への歩行速度

Resilience.Description:
耐久力は"シールド"の容量を増加させ、PvEでのダメージ軽減率を向上させ、ダメージを受けた時のひるみを軽減させます。またステイシス凍結状態からの解放アクションを行った場合に受けるダメージが減少します。

"シールド"は耐久力によって115から130の間で変化しますが、"体力"は70で固定です。

また、耐久力はタイタンのクラススキルのクールダウン速度を向上させます。
Resilience.TotalHP:
キャラクターの最大HPを決定します。

最大HPは70で固定の"体力"部分と、耐久力によって115から130の範囲で変動する"シールド"で構成されます。
Resilience.PvEDamageResistance: PvEアクティビティでのダメージ軽減率
Resilience.FlinchResistance: ダメージを受けた場合のひるみ軽減率

Recovery.Description:
Recovery governs the delay before your 'Health' and 'Shields' start regeneration as well as how fast they regenerate.

Recovery also determines the Class Ability cooldown of Warlocks.
Recovery.TotalRegenTime: How long it takes to fully regenerate your Health and Shields from 0 HP.
Recovery.HealthRegenDelay:
How long it takes to start regenerating 'Health' after taking damage.

Health is a fixed 70 HP portion of your Total HP alongside 'Shields'.
Recovery.HealthRegenSpeed: How fast your 'Health' regenerates once the delay after taking damage is over.
Recovery.ShieldRegenDelay:
How long it takes for your 'Shields' to start regenerating after taking damage.

Shields are a 115 to 130 HP portion of your Total HP alongside 'Health'.
Recovery.ShieldRegenSpeed: How fast your 'Shields' regenerate once the delay after taking damage is over.

Discipline.Description: Discipline governs your Grenade Ability cooldown.

Intellect.Description:
Intellect governs your passive Super Ability cooldown.

Super Abilities with longer cooldowns receive less Super Energy from dealing or receiving Damage, as well as from getting Kills or Assists. Conversely, Super Abilities with shorter cooldowns receive more Super Energy from the same actions.
Intellect.PvPDamageResistance: How much Damage Resistance your Super Ability provides in PvP.
Intellect.PvEDamageResistance: How much Damage Resistance your Super Ability provides in PvE.

DRCondition.CastAnimation: Active during the Super Cast animation.
DRCondition.GoldenGunDeadShot1: Passively Active with the Knock 'Em Down Aspect
DRCondition.WellOfRadiance2: Against any damage not dealt with a Primary Ammo Weapon

Strength.Description: Strength governs your Melee Ability cooldown.
